hanzi-su-wiki:
範

Значения

Пример, образец, модель; сфера, область; пропорциональность

Мнемоника

Модель повозки 車, выполненная из бамбука 竹. По бутону 巴 можно судить о цветке, а по модели — о телеге. Все пропорции соблюдены.

Варианты

范, 笵
purpleculture_pinyin:
fàn
model
модель
rtega_mnemonic:
範範RS
范范		pattern, model, rule, law
  • tracks 𨊠 carved into bamboo 竹
  • pattern into which the water flows while spreading in a flood 氾 through the vegetation 艹
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 㔾 indicates the sound; ⺮ (bamboo) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
师範 [ shī fàn ]: Normal (e.g. Beijing Normal University)
示範 [ shì fàn ]: demonstrate; demonstration
範畴 [ fàn chóu ]: category
範例 [ fàn lì ]: example; model
範式 [ fàn shì ]: paradigm
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • ⺮ [ zhú ] bamboo; flute
    • ⿰ Left to right
      • 車 [ chē ] cart, vehicle; to move in a cart
      • 㔾 [ xiān ] seal; kneeling person
heisig_chinese_memo: This pattern made of bamboo is for a new model of car designed to leave as small an ecological fingerprint as possible.
koohiiStory1: This pattern made of bamboo is for a new model of car designed to leave as small an ecological fingerprint as possible.
koohiiStory2: I just had a new bamboo-leaf pattern spray-painted on my car. Don't touch it, you'll leave fingerprints!
jp_example_words:
規範(きはん): model, standard, pattern, norm, criterion, example
模範(もはん): exemplar, exemplification, exemplum, model, example
範囲(はんい): extent, scope, sphere, range
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: This bamboo can be whittled into an example of anything. See, here's a car. Here's a snake. I can make so many examples just with bamboo.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: It's amazing how fast this guy can whittle!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: One last example for you. Now I'm going to take this bamboo and whittle it into an example of Han (はん) Solo!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Han Solo's bamboo example comes to life and runs off.
Ru_Radicals: 乙 (второй), 卩 (печать), 竹 (бамбук), 車 (автомобиль)
Ru_trainchinese: fàn: (графема) образец, модель, пример; граница, предел; (книжн.) контролировать, ограничивать
Kanshudo_mnemonic: you can use a bamboo (⺮) seal (㔾) to get a car (車) for example
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: This pattern made of bamboo is for a new model of car designed to leave as small an ecological fingerprint as possible.
humanum_full_description_en:
Save the sound from " car " and "笵". "Said Wen": "Fan, Fan Di also. From the car, the sound of the province. Reading and committing the same." One said " Fan " from the sound of " 𨊠 ". Xu Hao "Shu Wen Jie Zi Annotation": ""Zhou Li" "Da Yu Sacrifice", Du Zichunyun: "Lang is regarded as 𨊠, 𨊠 is called Che Shiqian. However, Fan Dang will follow the sound of 𨊠, not from the province "Xu Shu did not accept the word 𨊠, so Yuner."" The Chu Bamboo Slips of the Warring States Period took " 𨊠 " as the " fan " and joined Xu Jian.

"Shuowen" refers to the original meaning of " fan " as a sacrificial ritual before traveling in ancient times. "Shuowen": "Wu, the general will have something to do with the Tao, you must first tell the gods, set up the altar and have four links, and the tree and grass will be based on the gods. Not only sacrifices the silk, and walks on the animal, it is the fan." Zhu Junsheng "Shu Wen Tong Xun Ding Sheng": "Fan Ji, the sacrifice of the ancestor Tao. If you have something to do with Tao, you must first tell its god. The altar is a mountain elephant with four links, and the tree is like a bodhisattva, thorns and cypresses. Sacrifice, behave like a cat. If you commit a crime, it means that there is no danger or difficulty." "Zhou Li" is used as a "crime", and " crime " is the same as " fan ".

" Fan " in ancient books means models and molds for making utensils, and is also used as "笵" and " fan ". "Ji Yun. Fan Yun: "Fan, Mo Ye." Such as "Fayan. "Five Hundreds": "Sichuan has defenses, and instruments have styles. See the best of etiquette." Northern Song Dynasty Shen Kuo "Mengxi Bi Tan. "Techniques": "If you want to print, you use an iron fan to set the iron plate, which is densely covered with characters, and the full iron fan is one plate." Another example is "qian fan", which is a mold for casting money. Archaeological discoveries have unearthed many pre-Qin A copper fan used for coinage in the Han Dynasty.

" Fan " also means making and casting with models. Such as "Lun Heng. "Material Situation": "A man who cultivates today's husband, who is an early-born tool, must be a model, pretending to be a model." "Confucius Jiayu. Inquiring Li: "Fan Jin combined with the earth, thinking of the terraces, palaces, and households." Yuan Dynasty Jie Xisi "Zhuozhou Confucian Temple Ritual Vessels": "Fan uses copper, which is convenient to have a division, but the ancient system of sage kings only survives. Name Yan Er."

" Fan " is extended to models and rules. "Er Ya. "Explanation on the Interpretation": "Fan, Faye." Such as "Shangshu. "Hong Fan": "Tian Nai Xi Yu Hong Fan Jiuchou, Yi Lun You Xu." "Three Kingdoms. Wei Shu. "Wang Wuqiu Zhuge and Deng Zhongzhuan": "Writing is a model for the world, and acting as a scholar." "Wen Xin Diao Long. "Things": "As for the Cui class, Zhang Cai, then he remembers the classics and history, and Huashi protects him, because he has made contributions to the book, it is also the paradigm of future generations."

" Fan " means model and role model. Such as "Fayan. "Xue Xing": "Teacher, a model of man." "Book of Later Han. "The Biography of Yang Zhen": "The merits of the teacher are both internal and external, and the work of the generals is also diligent." Jiang Yan of the Southern Dynasty "On Inaction": "It is the old man who thinks it is the history, Zhuang Zhou thinks the garden official, the east holds The halberd is tireless, the nun is not ashamed of his whip, he is a teacher of eternity and a master of the moment."

" Fan " also means norms and restrictions. Such as "Mencius. Teng Wengong 2": "I am a fan and I drive, and I won't get one all day long." "Wen Xin Diao Long. Zhao Ce": "Admonish Yuan Ya and set an example for the offspring." "The Family Instructions of Yan Family. "Preface": "Now that I am here again, I have no courage to follow things in the world. Karma is to tidy up the door and tear down the descendants."
humanum_short_description_en: From " car ", "笵" to save the sound. Say from the sound of " 𨊠 ". The original meaning is the ritual of sacrificial offerings before traveling in ancient times.
humanum_full_description:
從「車」，「笵」省聲。《說文》：「範，範軷也。从車，笵省聲。讀與犯同。」一說「範」從「𨊠」聲。徐灝《說文解字注箋》：「《周禮》『大馭祭軓』，杜子春云：『軓當為𨊠，𨊠謂車軾前也。然則範當從𨊠聲，不必從笵省。許書未收𨊠字，故云爾。』」戰國楚簡以「𨊠」為「範」，與徐箋合。

　　《說文》指「範」的本義是古代出行前祭祀的儀式。《說文》：「軷，出將有事於道，必先告其神，立壇四通，樹茅以依神為軷。既祭軷，轢於牲而行，為範軷。」朱駿聲《說文通訓定聲》：「範軷，祖道之祭也。出將有事于道，必先告其神，立壇為山象四通，樹茅若菩蒭棘柏以依神。既祭，轢牲而行為範。犯之而過，喻無險難也。」《周禮》作「犯軷」，「犯」與「範」同。

　　「範」在古書中表示製作器物的模型、模具，又作「笵」、「范」。《集韻．范韻》：「範，模也。」如《法言．五百》：「川有防，器有範，見禮教之至也。」北宋沈括《夢溪筆談．技藝》：「欲印，則以一鐵範置鐵板上，乃密布字印，滿鐵範為一板。」又如「錢範」，即鑄錢的模具，考古發現出土了不少先秦兩漢鑄幣用的銅範。

　　「範」亦表示用模型製作、鑄造。如《論衡．物勢》：「今夫陶冶者，初埏埴作器，必模範為形，故作之也。」《孔子家語．問禮》：「範金合土，以為臺榭、宮室、戶牖。」元代揭傒斯〈涿州孔廟禮器記〉：「範之以銅，取便于有司，而古先聖王之制僅存其名號焉耳。」

　　「範」引申為典範、法則。《爾雅．釋詁上》：「範，法也。」如《尚書．洪範》：「天乃錫禹洪範九疇，彝倫攸敘。」《三國志．魏書．王毌丘諸葛鄧鍾傳》：「文為世範，行為士則。」《文心雕龍．事類》：「至於崔班張蔡，遂捃摭經史，華實布護，因書立功，皆後人之範式也。」

　　「範」表示模範、榜樣。如《法言．學行》：「師者，人之模範也。」《後漢書．楊震列傳》：「師範之功，昭于內外，庶官之務，勞亦勤止。」南朝江淹〈無為論〉：「是故老聃以為柱史，莊周以為園吏，東方持戟而不倦，尼父執鞭而不恥，實萬古之師範，一時之高士。」

　　「範」也表示規範、限制。如《孟子．滕文公下》：「吾為之範我馳驅，終日不獲一。」《文心雕龍．詔策》：「勸戒淵雅，垂範後代。」《顏氏家訓．序致》：「吾今所以復為此者，非敢軌物範世也，業以整齊門內，提撕子孫。」
humanum_short_description: 從「車」，「笵」省聲。一說從「𨊠」聲。本義是古代出行前祭祀的儀式。
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
範
Pinyin: fàn
English Definition: model
Total strokes: 15; Radical: 竹
Pictophonetic: 㔾 indicates the sound; ⺮ (bamboo) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿱ Above to below
    • ⺮ [ zhú ] bamboo; flute
    • ⿰ Left to right
      • 車 [ chē ] cart, vehicle; to move in a cart
      • 㔾 [ xiān ] seal; kneeling person
Example Words:
师範 [ shī fàn ]: Normal (e.g. Beijing Normal University)
示範 [ shì fàn ]: demonstrate; demonstration
範畴 [ fàn chóu ]: category
範例 [ fàn lì ]: example; model
範式 [ fàn shì ]: paradigm
More: 範* | *範 | *範*

(- limits of the cart 範圍)

規範(きはん): model, standard, pattern, norm, criterion, example
模範(もはん): exemplar, exemplification, exemplum, model, example
範囲(はんい): extent, scope, sphere, range

從「 車 」，「 笵 」省聲。《說文》：「範，範軷也。从車，笵省聲。讀與犯同。」一說「 範 」從「 𨊠 」聲。徐灝《說文解字注箋》：「《周禮》『大馭祭軓』，杜子春云：『軓當為𨊠，𨊠謂車軾前也。然則範當從𨊠聲，不必從笵省。許書未收𨊠字，故云爾。』」戰國楚簡以「 𨊠 」為「 範 」，與徐箋合。 《說文》指「 範 」的本義是古代出行前祭祀的儀式。《說文》：「軷，出將有事於道，必先告其神，立壇四通，樹茅以依神為軷。既祭軷，轢於牲而行，為範軷。」朱駿聲《說文通訓定聲》：「範軷，祖道之祭也。出將有事于道，必先告其神，立壇為山象四通，樹茅若菩蒭棘柏以依神。既祭，轢牲而行為範。犯之而過，喻無險難也。」《周禮》作「犯軷」，「 犯 」與「 範 」同。 「 範 」在古書中表示製作器物的模型、模具，又作「 笵 」、「 范 」。《集韻．范韻》：「範，模也。」如《法言．五百》：「川有防，器有範，見禮教之至也。」北宋沈括《夢溪筆談．技藝》：「欲印，則以一鐵範置鐵板上，乃密布字印，滿鐵範為一板。」又如「錢範」，即鑄錢的模具，考古發現出土了不少先秦兩漢鑄幣用的銅範。 「 範 」亦表示用模型製作、鑄造。如《論衡．物勢》：「今夫陶冶者，初埏埴作器，必模範為形，故作之也。」《孔子家語．問禮》：「範金合土，以為臺榭、宮室、戶牖。」元代揭傒斯〈涿州孔廟禮器記〉：「範之以銅，取便于有司，而古先聖王之制僅存其名號焉耳。」 「 範 」引申為典範、法則。《爾雅．釋詁上》：「範，法也。」如《尚書．洪範》：「天乃錫禹洪範九疇，彝倫攸敘。」《三國志．魏書．王毌丘諸葛鄧鍾傳》：「文為世範，行為士則。」《文心雕龍．事類》：「至於崔班張蔡，遂捃摭經史，華實布護，因書立功，皆後人之範式也。」 「 範 」表示模範、榜樣。如《法言．學行》：「師者，人之模範也。」《後漢書．楊震列傳》：「師範之功，昭于內外，庶官之務，勞亦勤止。」南朝江淹〈無為論〉：「是故老聃以為柱史，莊周以為園吏，東方持戟而不倦，尼父執鞭而不恥，實萬古之師範，一時之高士。」 「 範 」也表示規範、限制。如《孟子．滕文公下》：「吾為之範我馳驅，終日不獲一。」《文心雕龍．詔策》：「勸戒淵雅，垂範後代。」《顏氏家訓．序致》：「吾今所以復為此者，非敢軌物範世也，業以整齊門內，提撕子孫。」

Radicals: 竹, 車, 巳  (bamboo, car, snake)
Meaning Mnemonic
This bamboo can be whittled into an example of anything. See, here's a car. Here's a snake. I can make so many examples just with bamboo.
It's amazing how fast this guy can whittle!
Reading Mnemonic
One last example for you. Now I'm going to take this bamboo and whittle it into an example of Han (はん) Solo!
Han Solo's bamboo example comes to life and runs off.
